items.title: Statue of Celtic legend Tommy Gemmell unveiled
items.description: Gemmell scored in the side's 1967 European Cup win and won 15 major honours with the club.

items.title: Statue unveiled for late Celtic legend Tommy Gemmell
items.description: A statue of Lisbon Lion Tommy Gemmell has been unveiled in his hometown of Craigneuk, honouring the Celtic legend’s European heroics and deep roots in the local community.

items.title: Luke McCowan says that 'no team in the league' can touch Celtic at their best
items.description: Luke McCowan believes that no one in Scotland can live with Celtic when they are on their game, as the midfielder talked up his side’s chances of a crucial win at Ibrox this Sunday after his goal helped his side to an impressive victory in Stuttgart.
